Articles.Content:
Are there any mods which provide a nose cone for the Mk2 parts?

In trying to make a Skylon equivalent, I noticed that a nose formed of current parts is heavier (and uglier) than using the Mk2 cockpit.

Would anyone be able to design a Mk2 nose cone containing LFO or LF?

Look at this.

Add fuel to a nose cone is a bad idea but you can always tweak the config of the part, with a potential issue of weird behaviour depending of the tank actual capacity

(+ it needs a clear fuel flow from nose to engine(s), unless you use Goodspeed pump pulg-in).
